original_text: It was the time of the harvest and there was a lot of water coming down the river. But when the priests reached the shore of the river with the Covenant Box and their feet touched the water, 16 the water stopped. It stopped a long way up the river, at a town called Adam. That is near Zarethan. The water going down to the Salt Sea stopped completely. So the people crossed the river near Jericho city.
korean_text: 요단이 곡식 거두는 시기에는 항상 언덕에 넘치더라 궤를 멘 자들이 요단에 이르며 궤를 멘 제사장들의 발이 물 가에 잠기자

sentences.original_text: It was the time of the harvest
and there was a lot of water coming down the river
But when the priests reached the shore of the river
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 제사장들이 강 기슭에 도착했을 때

sentences.original_text: and their feet touched the water
It stopped a long way up the river
sentences.korean_translation: 물은 강 위쪽 아주 먼 곳에서 멈추었습니다

sentences.original_text: The water going down to the Salt Sea stopped completely
sentences.korean_translation: 소금 바다로 내려가는 물이 완전히 멈췄습니다

sentences.original_text: So the people crossed the river near Jericho city
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 백성들은 여리고 성 근처에서 강을 건넜습니다
